snippet: Inmates in Suffolk County filed 69 lawsuits in less than a year to protest conditions, overwhelming the district court and resulting in a suit filed Thursday by the New York Civil Liberties Union.
abstract: New York Civil Liberties Union files a class-action lawsuit on behalf of inmates in Suffolk County Correctional Facilities, who filed 69 handwritten suits in less than a year to protest squalid living conditions, overwhelming the district court.
lead_paragraph: Inmates in Suffolk County filed 69 lawsuits in less than a year to protest conditions, overwhelming the district court and resulting in a suit filed Thursday by the New York Civil Liberties Union.

headline.seo: In Lawsuits, Suffolk County Inmates Complain of Squalor
headline.main: In Lawsuits, Long Island Inmates Complain of Squalor
headline.print_headline: In Lawsuits, L.I. Inmates Complain Of Squalor
